awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: Partial Differential Equations and   Probability
awd_abstract_narration: This project will consider regularity of solutions to                      degenerate elliptic equations, controlled diffusion processes,                  and Ito's stochastic equations.  A variety of techniques from                   partial differential equations and probability will be utilized.                These include barriers, study of boundary operators, and                        quasiderivatives.                                                                    The results of this project, in addition to furthering our                 understanding of the nature of solutions to partial differential                equations, will have applications to areas such as finance,                     population genetics, and control of chemical systems.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
